They were also known as "The Sensational Blind Boys", "The Five Blind Boys," The Original Five Blind Boys," and "The Blind Boys of Mississippi." Archie Brownlee, lead singer and one of the founding members of this group, was a major influence on members of other gospel groups as well as secular singers including Ray Charles.
